channel.title: Gym on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Gym on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Good Physique & Polio-stricken Chicken's Leg
item.description:
I don’t know whether to be happy or doubtful when a stranger walks up to me in the gym and

  1. Stranger
    :
    Hey
  2. Me
    :
    Hi
  3. Stranger
    :
    You are regular here?
  4. Me
    :
    (have you ever seen me here earlier?) No. Second day in this gym.
  5. Stranger
    :
    Oh okay.
  6. Me
    :
    Why?
  7. Stranger
    :
    You have got a good physique dude. (smiles)
  8. Me
    :
    Aha, thanks buddy! (flees the scene)

This has happened a couple of times before; back then it was my friends/acquaintances and I knew I deserved it! :o)Â  But now? Gentleman, you are either trying to motivate me or hitting on me!
